title.rendered: India confidence valid as it grows amid global woes: Bill Winters, Standard Chartered group chief executive

content.rendered:
A sense of confidence in India about the state of the economy is justified, given its strong growth amid a global economy that’s being pummelled by multi-decade high inflation, war, an energy crisis and turbulent financial markets, said Bill Winters, group chief executive of Standard Chartered Plc.

Various segments of the Indian economy – from policy makers, businesses and the financial system – appear to be singing from the same song sheet, in a turnaround from the earlier discordant no ..
